data.why:
I plan to contribute packages for management of inheritance-enabled
    object persistence on RDMS along with basic library modules that
    implement commonly-useful schema, especially those that apply to a
    business/bureaucratic context.

    I may contribute other packages, but they will almost certainly
    apply directly to the application/problem domain stated above.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (JALONSO; Jason B. Alonso)
